title: Log ingest
content: Sync biometric device logs and web/CSV entries into a clean attendance register. Auto-flag missing punches, duplicate swipes, and out-of-shift hours so approvers can fix issues before they ripple into payroll.

title: Exceptions & OT
content: Route exceptions and overtime for approval with SLAs. Once cleared, the system recalculates late arrivals, OT slabs, half-days, and no-pay rules, updating every affected register and audit trail in real time.

title: Leave approvals
content: Apply approved leave to balances and calendars instantly. Accruals, proration, carry-forward and encashment rules are enforced, preventing shift conflicts and ensuring accurate eligibility when payroll is processed.

title: Pre-payroll checks
content: Validate pending approvals, earnings and deductions, loans/advances, and roster anomalies. Variance views surface outliers by employee, department, or site so finance can confirm numbers before processing.

title: Payroll run
content: Execute payroll with EPF/ETF/APIT and stamp duty applied. Generate bilingual payslips, bank payment files, and GL exports in one pass, with versioned packs for reviewers and a complete change log for auditors.

title: Statutory & reports
content: Assemble statutory returns and reportsâ€”C1, R1, R4; EPF/ETF half-year submissions; APIT schedules T9, T10, T6. Reconciliation sheets and control reports package everything required for filing and audits.

title: Month-end lock
content: Lock the period to preserve integrity. Freezing registers and figures keeps approvals, exports, and documents consistent; any late changes route through controlled adjustments with full audit trails.
